underlying_goal: Refactor a DSPy-based agent system to follow correct patterns: move signatures to signatures.py files, use proper prompt organization with individual files per agent, add FastAPI wrapper, and update the implementation builder skill
friction_detail: Claude deleted comprehensive prompts during refactor without backing them up, got lost in wrong directories, and had to regenerate prompts from scratch after user pointed out the mistake.
brief_summary: User wanted to fix structural issues in a DSPy agent codebase (signatures, prompts, FastAPI); Claude made progress but deleted important prompt files during refactor, requiring regeneration and multiple course corrections from the user.
